# Pull Request Template

## Purpose

This template guides contributors in submitting high-quality pull requests.

---

## Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure you have:

*   [ ] Reviewed the [CONTRIBUTING.md](./.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines.
*   [ ] Verified that your changes align with the project's architectural principles and standards.
*   [ ] Run linters and formatters (`ruff check --fix . && ruff format .`).
*   [ ] Executed all tests (`pytest`).
*   [ ] Documented any new features or significant changes.
*   [ ] Updated the README.md if necessary.
*   [ ] Ensured no sensitive information is exposed.
*   [ ] Requested at least one reviewer.

---

## Description

Provide a clear and concise summary of your changes. What problem does this PR solve? What new functionality does it introduce?

## Related Issues

Link any relevant GitHub issues using keywords like `fixes #`, `closes #`, or `related to #`.

## Changes Made

*   [ ] Bug fix
*   [ ] New feature
*   [ ] Refactor
*   [ ] Documentation update
*   [ ] Performance improvement
*   [ ] Chore

*Describe the specific changes in detail.*

## Screenshots/Recordings (if applicable)

*Attach relevant screenshots or recordings for UI changes.*
